name: DKO WP Tools
author: davidosomething

sections.description:
Please report issues, fork, etc. from the GitHub repository: https://github.com/davidosomething/dkowptools

Adds browser resolution to your admin bar. There’s an option to add it to a root node if you’re using my dkowpconfig setup, but no admin panel/gui for it yet.
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate this plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

OR

  1. Upload the dkowptools folder to your plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq: Please report issues, fork, etc. from the GitHub repository: https://github.com/davidosomething/dkowptools

short_description: Add browser resolution to your admin bar.
